text: Everything old is new again, if the latest TV reboot craze is to be believed. We have Netflix to thank for a lot of these redos : from'80s family classic Full House's return with Fuller House to early - aughts pop culture staple Gilmore Girls, revisited for the four - part Gilmore Girls : A Year in The Life, and now, everyone â€™ s favorite teenage witch is returning to screens. Netflix has now greenlit two seasons of a Sabrina the Teenage Witch reboot, based largely on the Archie Comics series The Chilling Adventures of Sabrina. We did some digging to find out all there is to know about the reboot ahead of its release. The show will stream on Netflix.
